content: chain 3 to join then slip_stitch to the nearest chain 3 corner 12 continue working row until you have worked 47 sts + 4 x 3 chain sps row in total round 2 1 double_crochet/single_crochet in chain of the beginning chain 4 to join slip_stitch to the next chain 3 space 12 v-sts + 4 x 3 chain sps round 4 chain 3 counts as first treble_crochet/double_crochet 2 treble_crochet/double_crochet chain 3 1 cluster into the chain 3 space * 1 cluster between each of the 2 v-sts of row 3 there should be two cluster in- between each corner 1 cluster chain 3 1 cluster on the next chain 3 space * repeat from * to * twice 1 cluster be- tween each of the 2 v-sts of row 3 slip_stitch to top of chain 3 to join then slip_stitch to the nearest chain 3 corner 16 cls + 4 x 3 chain sps round 5 1
